image.alt: Leavitt Orthodontics team celebrating at the office grand opening, bright welcoming orthodontic practice

paragraphs.text: Welcome! Dr. Leavitt and his team pride themselves on giving you and your smile the attention it deserves in Pocatello, Idaho. Our outstanding personal service, modern orthodontic technology, and convenient scheduling create a friendly, comfortable experience where patients feel like part of a community.
Learn more about what makes our care different and how we make treatment approachable and affordable, from clear aligners to efficient bracket systems and easy, flexible payment options.

items.title: One Doctor, One Focus
items.text: A local practice led by Dr. Tyler Leavitt, focused on personalized care in one convenient Pocatello location.

items.title: Flexible Payments
items.text: Personalized, flexible plans (including zero down options) to make braces and aligners affordable for families.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.text: Certified Invisalign<sup>®</sup> provider and modern bracket systems like Damon for efficient, aesthetic treatment.

items.title: Community Care
items.text: Family-friendly care with patient appreciation events and a focus on treating every person like family.

paragraphs.text: Tyler Leavitt, DDS, MSD is a Pocatello native who returned to Southeast Idaho to build a patient-centered orthodontic practice. He completed his dental training at Creighton University School of Dentistry and pursued orthodontic specialty training at Saint Louis Universitys Center for Advanced Dental Education. Dr. Leavitt brings award-winning clinical training and a warm, community-minded approach to every patient visit.

image.alt: Dr. Tyler Leavitt, orthodontist at Leavitt Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: From traditional braces to Invisalign clear aligners, we offer treatment options for children, teens, and adults to match every lifestyle and smile goal.

og_meta.description: Leavitt Orthodontics in Pocatello offers Invisalign�, braces, retainers, and personalized orthodontic care with flexible payments.

image.alt: Team of orthodontic professionals smiling in the Lakeshore Orthodontics office lobby

paragraphs.text: One Doctor. One Location. One Focus, YOU! Our office in Pocatello, Idaho is open and accepting patients. We want your experience to be comfortable, fun and enjoyable. We can't wait to see you and your smile.

image.alt: Dr. Tyler Leavitt smiling

paragraphs.text: Tyler Leavitt DDS, MSD was born in Pocatello and raised in Blackfoot, Idaho. From the first day of dental school, Dr. Leavitt knew he wanted to become an orthodontist and return to serve southeastern Idaho. He created Leavitt Orthodontics to combine a dedication to excellent clinical care with a friendly, family-centered approach that helps patients feel comfortable and confident.

Dr. Leavitt is passionate about getting to know patients as individuals, making them laugh, and treating them like family. He brings that same enthusiasm to every treatment, focusing on lasting results and a positive experience for each person who walks through the door.

image.alt: Dr. Leavitt at the practice grand opening

paragraphs.text: Dr. Leavitt earned his Doctor of Dental Surgery at Creighton University School of Dentistry, where he graduated with honors and received multiple awards recognizing clinical excellence and service. He continued his specialty training in orthodontics at Saint Louis University Center for Advanced Dental Education, completing an advanced residency in orthodontics and dentofacial orthopedics.
While in dental school and residency, Dr. Leavitt was recognized with awards for scholarship and service and was inducted into honor societies recognizing high academic and professional standards.

image.alt: Dr. Leavitt portrait

paragraphs.text: Outside the office Dr. Leavitt enjoys getting to know patients and their families, participating in community events, and making people laugh. He values opportunities to give back locally through school events, patient appreciation activities, and fundraising efforts.
Dr. Leavitt is also a Certified Invisalign Provider and enjoys helping patients explore clear-aligner options when appropriate.

image.alt: Dr. Leavitt with community members

paragraphs.text: LEAVITT ORTHODONTICS is at 1455 Bench Rd. STE. A, Pocatello, ID 83201. To schedule a free consultation, call (208) 237-3330 or use our online form to request an appointment.
Our office hours are Monday–Friday, 8:00 am - 5:00 pm. We accept new patients of all ages and will walk you through treatment options, insurance, and financing when you arrive.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dentist's surgery

paragraphs.text: One Doctor. One Location. One Focus— YOU! We want your experience to be comfortable, fun and enjoyable. We can't wait to see you and your smile.
Schedule A Free Consultation Today! All the information so that you can make the right choice. Browse our patient resources, take a virtual tour, or contact us with any questions before your visit.
Dr. Leavitt leads our team with a patient-first approach. Learn about his background, clinical focus, and what you can expect at your first appointment on the Meet Dr. Leavitt page.

og_meta.title: Get Started | Leavitt Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Start your care with Leavitt Orthodontics in Pocatello. Schedule a free consultation, find office hours, and access patient resources online.

image.alt: Bright, welcoming orthodontic office interior with smiling staff and patients

paragraphs.text: Perfect smiles start with precise bracket placement. Damon brackets are positioned to support a natural smile arc and efficient tooth movement.

image.alt: Close-up of a smiling person's mouth showing white teeth with a highlighted smile line

paragraphs.text: The Damon system uses self-ligating brackets designed for efficient movement and patient comfort, often reducing treatment visits.

image.alt: Close-up of a smile with teeth wearing braces

paragraphs.text: Clear, removable aligners use advanced 3D imaging to fit you precisely and move teeth with predictable steps.
Enjoy brushing, flossing, and eating without bracket restrictions while working toward your best smile.

image.alt: Open box containing clear aligners and accessories

paragraphs.text: Durable, effective, and cost-conscious, metal braces remain a reliable choice for many patients. Flexible payment options are available to make treatment accessible.

image.alt: Patient smiling with braces

paragraphs.text: Traditional bracket placement can create a flatter smile line. We evaluate bracket position to balance function and the aesthetics of your smile.

image.alt: Close-up of upper front teeth with orthodontic braces and clear brackets

paragraphs.text: Smile arc protection focuses on bracket placement to preserve a natural curve to the upper teeth, improving aesthetics and tooth display.

image.alt: Braces viewed close-up showing alignment and smile curve

paragraphs.text: Retainers hold teeth in their new positions while bone and soft tissue stabilize. Wearing them as prescribed is the best way to keep your smile long term.
Teeth can shift over time from normal forces like chewing and speaking; your retainer schedule will be tailored to your needs.

image.alt: Orthodontic patient holding retainer case

paragraphs.text: Essix retainers are clear, custom-fit retainers made in-office. They’re comfortable and nearly invisible, though they may need occasional replacement.
Bonded retainers are attached to the back of teeth for long-term stability. They don’t require removal but need careful cleaning to maintain oral health.

image.alt: Young woman smiling while holding an orthodontic retainer
Beautiful young woman smiling and holding orthodontic retainer
Family enjoying time together outside, inviting patients to schedule a consultation

image.alt: Patient smiling with orthodontic braces in our office

paragraphs.text: Find answers to common questions about orthodontic treatments, appointment scheduling, and payment options at Leavitt Orthodontics.

accordion.header: What orthodontic treatments do you offer?

paragraphs.text: We provide traditional metal braces, ceramic (tooth-colored) braces, and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> clear aligners for teens and adults. We also design custom retainers and offer early treatment when dental development suggests it may help.

image.alt: Happy family portrait in a bright orthodontic office

accordion.header: At what age should my child see an orthodontist?

paragraphs.text: The American Association of Orthodontists recommends an initial evaluation by age 7. Early visits let us watch development and, if needed, recommend timely treatment that can simplify care later.

image.alt: Orthodontic consultation in a modern treatment room

accordion.header: How long does treatment usually take?

paragraphs.text: Treatment length varies by the issue being corrected. Many patients complete orthodontic care in 12 to 24 months, but we will give a personalized timeline after your initial exam and records.

image.alt: Orthodontic team discussing treatment plans

accordion.header: What payment and insurance options are available?

paragraphs.text: We accept most major dental insurance plans and offer flexible monthly payment arrangements. Our team will review your benefits and present financing options to fit your budget.

image.alt: Patient discussing payment options at the front desk

accordion.header: How can I schedule an appointment?

paragraphs.text: You can request an appointment using our online contact form at https://drleavittortho.com/contact. The form lets you tell us about preferred times and the reason for your visit so we can find the best appointment for your family.

image.alt: Parent and child smiling after an appointment
Family enjoying time together outside, inviting patients to schedule a consultation
